biotools.summary: Tool for predicting effects of variants for any genome in Ensembl or with genome annotation (via GFF). This includes vertebrates and also plants, fungi, protists, metazoa and bacteria.  There is a web and a REST API version but the most powerful is the Perl script version. See McLaren et al., 2016, Genome Biology

bioschemas.name: Variant Effect Predictor (VEP)
